content:
import * as types from '@constants/actionTypes';
import * as actions from '@containers/app/action';

/**
 * containers/app/epic.js : test epic
 * @param {Object} action$ stream of actions
 * @param {Object} store the main store to be used
 * @param {Object} dependencies the dependencies to be injected inside the epic
 *   @param {Function} dependencies.getJSON the rxjs getJSON function
 *   @param {Function} dependencies.of the rxjs of function
 * @returns {Array} an array of actions to be dispatched
 **/
export const test = (action$, store, { getJSON, of }) =>
  action$.ofType(types.TEST).mergeMap(action =>
    getJSON(`https://api.github.com/users/${action.payload}`)
      .map(response => actions.testSuccess(response))
      .takeUntil(action$.ofType(types.TEST_CANCEL))
      .catch(error => of(actions.testError(error))),
  );

unknown.tagValue: {Array} an array of actions to be dispatched

params.name: store
params.description: the main store to be used

params.name: dependencies
params.description: the dependencies to be injected inside the epic

return.description: an array of actions to be dispatched

import * as types from '@constants/actionTypes';
import * as actions from '@containers/home/action';

/**
 * containers/home/epic.js : test epic
 * @param {Object} action$ stream of actions
 * @param {Object} store the main store to be used
 * @param {Object} dependencies the dependencies to be injected inside the epic
 *   @param {Function} dependencies.getJSON the rxjs getJSON function
 *   @param {Function} dependencies.of the rxjs of function
 * @returns {Array} an array of actions to be dispatched
 **/
export const test = (action$, store, { getJSON, of }) =>
  action$.ofType(types.HOME_TEST).mergeMap(action =>
    getJSON(`https://api.github.com/users/${action.payload}`)
      .map(response => actions.testSuccess(response))
      .takeUntil(action$.ofType(types.HOME_TEST_CANCEL))
      .catch(error => of(actions.testError(error))),
  );

name: app/reducers/index.js

content:
# React-Redux-Enterprise

[![stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/Amin52J/React-Redux-Enterprise.svg?style=for-the-badge)](https://github.com/Amin52J/React-Redux-Enterprise/stargazers)
[![license](https://img.shields.io/github/license/Amin52J/React-Redux-Enterprise.svg?style=for-the-badge)](https://github.com/Amin52J/React-Redux-Enterprise/blob/master/LICENSE)

A React-Redux boilerplate for enterprise web applications.

### Materials

This repo is the minimal and extendable setup to start a new enterprise large-scaled project based on React & Redux & RxJS.

* **babel:** to transpile our ES6-7 code ES5
* **documentation.js:** to generate docs
* **enzyme:** as our test util
* **eslint:** to have linting utility over our code
* **jest:** as our test framework
* **prettier:** to apply linting to our code before commits
* **react:** as our framework
* **react-redux:** to handle data flow
* **react-router:** to handle routing
* **react-router-redux:** to handle routing
* **redux:** to handle data flow
* **redux-observable:** to handle async actions
* **redux-persist:** to have persistent store
* **rxjs:** to handle observable actions
* **styled-components:** to style our project
* **webpack:** as our module bundler

### How to start?

* Clone the project
* `yarn`
* `yarn start`
* visit [localhost:8080](http://127.0.0.1:8080)

### NOTE:

* To run the server you need to install `http-server-spa` as a global module, or you can implement your own server and point it to the public directory.
* You need to install `documentation` as a global module.
* All modules used are the latest versions and are implemented according to their respective latest version docs. (as of Oct 2018)

### Scripts

* `yarn build` to make a single production build
* `yarn dev` to make a single development build
* `yarn docs` to generate the docs
* `yarn lint` to run the lint check
* `yarn start` to start the server
* `yarn test` to run the tests
* `yarn watch` to start watching for file changes

### Read On

To read more about this project and to get familiar with the structure and find out the logic behind it, check out the articles on [Medium](https://medium.com/@a.jafari.90/how-to-start-an-enterprise-project-with-react-and-redux-563d73b61ef4), [Quora](https://amin52j.quora.com/How-to-start-an-enterprise-project-with-React-and-Redux) or [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/how-start-enterprise-project-react-andredux-amin-jafari/)

### License

This project is licensed under the [MIT License](https://github.com/Amin52J/React-Redux-Enterprise/blob/master/LICENSE).
name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "react-redux-enterprise",
  "version": "1.5.0",
  "author": "Amin Jafari",
  "description": "A React-Redux boilerplate for enterprise web applications",
  "main": "app/main.jsx",
  "scripts": {
    "build": "NODE_ENV=production webpack --mode production",
    "dev": "webpack --mode development",
    "docs": "esdoc",
    "lint": "prettier --write \"**/*.jsx\" && prettier --write \"**/*.js\" && eslint --fix ./app/**/*.{js,jsx} ; eslint --fix ./*.{js,jsx}",
    "prebuild": "rm -rf public",
    "precommit": "lint-staged",
    "predocs": "rm -rf docs",
    "preversion": "yarn test && yarn build && yarn docs",
    "start": "http-server-spa ./public",
    "test": "jest --updateSnapshot",
    "watch": "webpack --mode development --watch"
  },
  "browserslist": [
    "> 5%"
  ],
  "jest": {
    "moduleNameMapper": {
      "^@actions(.*)$": "<rootDir>/app/actions$1",
      "^@components(.*)$": "<rootDir>/app/components$1",
      "^@constants(.*)$": "<rootDir>/app/constants$1",
      "^@containers(.*)$": "<rootDir>/app/containers$1",
      "^@elements(.*)$": "<rootDir>/app/elements$1",
      "^@hoc(.*)$": "<rootDir>/app/hoc$1",
      "^@reducers(.*)$": "<rootDir>/app/reducers$1",
      "^@epics(.*)$": "<rootDir>/app/epics$1",
      "^@root(.*)$": "<rootDir>/app$1",
      "\\.(css|scss)$": "identity-obj-proxy"
    },
    "setupFiles": [
      "<rootDir>/shim.js",
      "<rootDir>/test.setup.js"
    ]
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "history": "^4.7.2",
    "prop-types": "^15.6.1",
    "react": "^16.4.0",
    "react-dom": "^16.4.0",
    "react-redux": "^5.0.7",
    "react-router": "^4.2.0",
    "react-router-dom": "^4.2.2",
    "react-router-redux": "next",
    "redux": "^4.0.0",
    "redux-observable": "^0.18.0",
    "redux-persist": "^5.9.1",
    "rxjs": "^5.5.11",
    "styled-components": "^3.4.9"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@babel/cli": "^7.1.2",
    "@babel/core": "^7.1.2",
    "@babel/plugin-proposal-class-properties": "^7.1.0",
    "@babel/plugin-proposal-object-rest-spread": "^7.0.0",
    "@babel/plugin-proposal-optional-chaining": "^7.0.0",
    "@babel/plugin-syntax-dynamic-import": "^7.0.0",
    "@babel/plugin-transform-async-to-generator": "^7.0.0",
    "@babel/plugin-transform-react-jsx": "^7.0.0",
    "@babel/polyfill": "^7.0.0",
    "@babel/preset-env": "^7.0.0",
    "@babel/preset-react": "^7.0.0",
    "babel-core": "^7.0.0-bridge",
    "babel-eslint": "8.0.1",
    "babel-jest": "^23.6.0",
    "babel-loader": "7.1.4",
    "babel-plugin-dynamic-import-node": "^1.2.0",
    "babel-plugin-styled-components": "^1.8.0",
    "babel-plugin-transform-object-rest-spread": "^6.26.0",
    "copy-webpack-plugin": "^4.5.1",
    "enzyme": "^3.3.0",
    "enzyme-adapter-react-16": "^1.1.1",
    "esdoc": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "eslint": "^4.19.1",
    "eslint-config-airbnb": "^15.1.0",
    "eslint-config-prettier": "^3.0.1",
    "eslint-plugin-import": "^2.10.0",
    "eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y": "^6.0.3",
    "eslint-plugin-prettier": "^2.6.2",
    "eslint-plugin-react": "^7.8.2",
    "identity-obj-proxy": "^3.0.0",
    "isomorphic-fetch": "^2.2.1",
    "jest": "^23.0.0",
    "json-loader": "^0.5.7",
    "lint-staged": "^7.0.0",
    "path": "^0.12.7",
    "prettier": "^1.14.3",
    "react-test-renderer": "^16.4.0",
    "uglifyjs-webpack-plugin": "^1.2.5",
    "url-loader": "^1.0.1",
    "webpack": "^4.9.1",
    "webpack-cli": "^3.1.1"
  },
  "lint-staged": {
    "*.{js,jsx}": [
      "prettier --write",
      "eslint --fix",
      "git add"
    ]
  },
  "engines": {
    "node": ">=8.11.1"
  },
  "repository": "https://github.com/Amin52J/React-Redux-Enterprise",
  "license": "MIT",
  "private": false
}
name: package.json
